description: Presents the way of life of the Hopi in Arizona's Grand Canyon. Stresses the degree to which these people have adjusted themselves to a difficult environment, showing their irrigation systems and food crops. Describes the secret marriage ritual of the Hopi Indian from the initial baking of corn for bread making to the final wedding ceremony.
